LanguageData.RPDia_DontPauseTooltip: If checked, the game will NOT pause when a dialog window opens.
LanguageData.RPDia_OpenWindowOnEventTooltip: If checked, the dialog window will open immediately when an event occurs, without waiting for the player to click the letter.
LanguageData.RPDia_TypingEffectTooltip: If checked, dialog text will appear with a typing effect.
LanguageData.RPDia_TypingSoundTooltip: Plays a sound as the text is being typed out.
LanguageData.RPDia_ResetSettings_Confirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to their default values? This cannot be undone.
LanguageData.RPDia_TypingSoundsFolderTooltip: Click to open the folder for custom typing sounds.\n\nChanges require a game restart to apply.
LanguageData.RPDia_PortraitsFolderTooltip:
Click to open the folder for custom storyteller portraits.

Image names must match the storyteller's defName.
Changes require a game restart to apply.
LanguageData.RPDia_DialogFontSizeTooltip: Adjust the font size used in dialog windows (in pixels).
LanguageData.RPDia_UseOtherFactionNarratorTooltip: If checked, messages from other factions will show their pawn as the narrator.
LanguageData.RPDia_ShowTraderPortraitTooltip: If checked, the trader's portrait will be displayed during trade.
LanguageData.RPDia_ShowNegotiatorPortraitTooltip: If checked, your negotiator's portrait will be displayed during trade.
LanguageData.RPDia_RefreshSoundsTooltip: Reload the list of custom typing sounds from the disk.
LanguageData.RPDia_OnlyShowInGameTooltip: If enabled, RPG Dialogs will only appear when a game is loaded, preventing issues in menus or character creation.
LanguageData.RPDia_AutoMode_CloseAtEndTooltip: If checked, Auto Mode will automatically close the window when the dialog ends (no choices left).
